name: AntiEntropic Beta 1.0
description:
This game was created for the 2021 LB's a jam about time,

The Beta is missing many features and will be updated before official release.

AntiEntropic is a game about uncovering the past so that the information isn't destroyed by time. You are a futuristic cube probe that can speed up your perception of time.

The game currently hold no gameplay objective, but it's playable. Most main functions work. Being engineless, development is a little slow.

A and D to hop left and right. Use the mouse scroll wheel to control the speed at which time is fast-forwarding. Menus are navigated with the mouse. The E key can be used to open the currently non-functional inventory. The Q key can be used to divide the fast forwarding by 10.
